entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False-positive in GetUsedAssemblyReferences #66188
  • Attribute argument of a type containing function pointer fails with `TypeLoadException` during reflection #66187

Closed

  • Syntax highlight breaks down when scrolling with sticky scroll headers enabled #66186
  • Decimal default parameter value is not propagated to the synthesized delegate #65728
  • Analyzer warnings disappear from Error List when the file with the warning is opened #26817
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • fix ignoring [MaybeNull] during type inference #66190
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Emit defensive copy for constrained call on `in` parameter #66189
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow missing document in method debug info #66183
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Adding ability for DeclarationModifiers class to support readonly structs and methods #66169
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Block `delegate*<void>...enum` constants in attributes #66073
    Area-Compilers
  • Support netmodules in `MetadataReference` factory methods #66076
    Area-Compilers
  • Skip implicit build optimization for false value of `OptimizeImplicitlyTriggeredBuild` #66182
    Area-Compilers, Community
